name: Visiting Shrine at Night | 夜間参拝
name_original: Visiting Shrine at Night | 夜間参拝
description:
"Do not visit the shrine at night, because..."

A horror walking simulator where you just go from left to right through the shrine at night.
If you spot something unusual, go back to the left.
If there is no problem, please proceed to the right.

This work is inspired by ``8th Exit'' (like 8th Exit).

play time
10 minutes to 60 minutes
